events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it and get a refund because the item does not match the description on your website.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund case based on the customer's request to return the item and receive their money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and receive a refund. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund promptly?
The order number is 987654, and the main reason for return is that the product color was significantly different from the pictures online.
Thank you for that info. We will initiate a full refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the prompt reply and the return label. I appreciate your help in resolving this quickly.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As there has been no further issue reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
